title: Divine Emerald and Diamond Nakshi Haaram
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Diamonds and vibrant Emeralds. Features South Sea Pearls. The gold has a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish
features: This exquisite Haaram features intricate Nakshi work, a hallmark of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The cascading design is adorned with dazzling diamonds, interspersed with captivating emeralds. The center showcases a pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by a halo of diamonds. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of elegance and tradition.
colors: with striking green emerald accents and the soft luster of white pearls.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for upscale events and special occasions where you want to make a statement.
description: This Haaram is a fusion of traditional South Indian artistry and contemporary design. The Nakshi work showcases centuries-old techniques, while the use of brilliant-cut diamonds and South Sea pearls adds a modern flair. Its durability and timeless elegance make it a valuable investment piece that can be passed down through generations. The emeralds symbolize prosperity and growth, adding a layer of auspiciousness to this already stunning piece.
